text:
I tried to load the jsp examples under jspexamples instead of examples as it is the case with the standard delivery configuration. In order to have this reflected in the automatically generated .conf file (i.e. tomcat-apache.conf), I modified the server.xml file as follow:

<!-- example - how to override AutoSetup actions -->
        <Context path="/jsp examples" docBase="webapps/examples" debug="0" reloadable="true" > 
        </Context>

I was expecting the generated .conf file to contain then 

Alias /jspexamples D:\Users_Misc\azh\WebServer\tomcat\webapps\examples
<Directory "D:\Users_Misc\azh\WebServer\tomcat\webapps\examples">
    Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
</Directory>
ApJServMount /jspexamples/servlet /jspexamples
<Location /jspexamples/WEB-INF/ >
    AllowOverride None
    deny from all
</Location>

This is not what I get, the result is the following:

Alias /jspexamples D:\Users_Misc\azh\WebServer\tomcat\webapps\jspexamples
<Directory "D:\Users_Misc\azh\WebServer\tomcat\webapps\jspexamples">
    Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
</Directory>
ApJServMount /jspexamples/servlet /jspexamples
<Location /jspexamples/WEB-INF/ >
    AllowOverride None
    deny from all
</Location>

Am I wrong in my configuration or is this a bug?

thanks

Alain
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
This is fixed in Tomcat 3.2 and up.
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
